title: A Story About an Old Man Who Is a Company S*ave Becoming a Sniper Who Enjoys Playing Games of PKing and PKed - Novel Updates
tags: Fantasy World   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Virtual Reality
author: Okura Inari   オクラいなり
description:
My name is Kentaro Tajima, a 34-year-old company slave who’s lazy.
When I play VR games to relieve stress, I naturally don't want to move, right?
Therefore, I need to be a sniper.
A sniper is someone who can solve everything with a single trigger. That is the best option. 

What, is there a player in the way of the raid?
Is there a player with a rare item?
There's a player you don't like?
Good, we will now start PKing.>
